info.title: Philanthropy Data Commons API
info.description: An API for a common data platform to make the process of submitting data requests to funders less burdensome for changemakers seeking grants.

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 only

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found

keycloakUserIdParam.name: keycloakUserId
keycloakUserIdParam.description: The Keycloak userId associated with the desired user.

countParam.name: _count
countParam.description: The maximum number of items that should appear per page or request.

searchParam.name: _content
searchParam.description: A web-search formatted string to select specific entities returned.

changemakerParam.name: changemaker
changemakerParam.description: A reference (ID) to an existing changemaker entity.

proposalParam.name: proposal
proposalParam.description: A reference (ID) to an existing proposal entity.

createdByParam.name: createdBy
createdByParam.description: A reference to a user entity, or 'me'.

auth.description: The OAuth 2.0 (and OpenID Connect) Authorization Code flow.

createdBy.description: The keycloak user id of the PDC user that created this bulk upload

keycloakOrganizationId.description: If available, the PDC Keycloak Organization ID for this entity.

fiscalSponsors.description: Fiscal sponsors (past and present) of this changemaker. Empty when unauthenticated. The response here will not include values for `fields` nor `fiscalSponsors` to avoid infinite recursion. Use the returned `id` to call $getChangemakerById for those details.

fields.description: For each base field, the best available value related to this changemaker. Empty when unauthenticated or when recursively querying changemakers, for example, within fiscal sponsors.

createdBy.description: The keycloak user id of the PDC user that created this proposal
The keycloak user id of the PDC user that created this bulk upload

description.example: The first name of the applicant

localizations.description: Keys can be expected to be IETF language tags.

total.description: The total number of requested resources that exist in the database, across all pages.

get.summary: Gets a list of application forms.

200.description: All application forms currently registered in the PDC.

201.description: The new application form that was created, with populated fields

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.

422.description: The application references entities that do not exist in the database.

parameters.name: applicationFormId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of an application form.

get.summary: Gets a list of bulk upload tasks.

200.description: Requested bulk uploads registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

post.summary: Registers a bulk upload task. This lets PDC ingest data previously uploaded via a POST to the /presignedPostRequests endpoint.

201.description: The bulk upload

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

200.description: Requested BaseFieldCopyTasks registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

post.summary: Creates a BaseFieldsCopyTask entity, which is then used to enqueue a basefield copying job to the job queue. This pulls basefields from a remote PDC instance and upserts them into the local database

201.description: The Sync BaseField

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.
Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

post.summary: Adds a new ChangemakerProposal associated with a specific changemaker.

201.description: The new ChangemakerProposal

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

200.description: Changemakers currently registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

201.description: The new changemaker that was created

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: changemakerId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a changemaker.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

patch.summary: Updates one or more fields of a specific changemaker.

parameters.name: changemakerId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a changemaker.

400.description: At least one valid field was not provided or invalid fields were provided.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

404.description: The given changemaker ID was not found.

parameters.name: changemakerId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a changemaker (fiscal sponsee).

parameters.name: fiscalSponsorChangemakerId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a changemaker (fiscal sponsor).

put.summary: Adds a fiscal sponsorship between the given changemakers.

200.description: The internal representation of the successfully created or updated fiscal sponsorship relation.

createdBy.description: The keycloak user id of the PDC user that added this fiscal sponsorship record.

notAfter.description: For internal use. This always be null in a response from this endpoint.

400.description: The same ID was passed for sponsor and sponsee or the IDs were out of range.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

422.description: The call passed one or more changemakerIds that do not exist in the database.

delete.summary: Deletes a fiscal sponsorship between the given changemakers. This does not remove either changemaker.

204.description: Confirmation of successful deletion of the fiscal sponsorship.

201.description: The presigned post request. Use the contents of this JSON to POST form data to S3. After posting data to S3, use the /bulkUploadTasks endpoint to let PDC ingest the data.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

200.description: A set of proposals currently registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

201.description: The new proposal that was created

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.

422.description: The proposal references entities that do not exist in the database.

parameters.name: proposalId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a proposal.

201.description: The new proposal version that was created, with populated field values

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

422.description: The proposal version references entities that do not exist in the database.

parameters.name: proposalVersionId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a proposal version.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

get.summary: Gets a list of base fields.

200.description: All base fields currently registered in the PDC.

201.description: The new base field that was created.

parameters.name: baseFieldId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a base field.

404.description: The base field could not be found.

get.summary: Gets a list of data providers.

parameters.name: dataProviderShortCode
parameters.description: The short code of a data provider.

put.summary: Creates or updates a new data provider.

parameters.name: dataProviderShortCode
parameters.description: The short code of a data provider.

201.description: The new data provider that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: funderShortCode
parameters.description: The short code of a funder.

parameters.description: The short code of a funder.

get.summary: Gets a list of base fields localizations for a given basefield.

parameters.name: baseFieldId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a base field.

200.description: All base field localizations for a given base field in the PDC.

404.description: The base field could not be found.

put.summary: Creates or updates a base field localization.

parameters.name: baseFieldId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a base field.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The valid IETF language tag for a base field localization

201.description: The new base field localization that was created.

400.description: Required fields were not provided or were incorrectly formatted.

409.description: There was a unique key conflict.

404.description: The base field could not be found.

200.description: A list of known funding opportunities.

201.description: The new opportunity that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: opportunityId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of an opportunity, RFC, potential award or grant, etc.

get.summary: Gets a list of platform provider responses.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: The external ID that has been associated with the response.  This ID is arbitrarily formatted, and cannot be predicted without knowledge of specific PDC data.

200.description: A list of cached platform provider responses.

post.summary: Adds a new platform provider response.

201.description: The new platform provider response that was created.

400.description: Required fields were not provided or were incorrectly formatted.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

200.description: All sources currently registered in the PDC.

201.description: The new source that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a source.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: The PDC-generated ID of a source to be deleted.

422.description: The referenced entity does not exist in the database.

put.summary: Creates or updates a user-changemaker permission.

parameters.name: userKeycloakUserId
parameters.description: The keycloak user id of a user.

parameters.name: changemakerId
parameters.description: The id of a changemaker.

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: The permission to be granted.

201.description: The resulting permission.

parameters.name: userKeycloakUserId
parameters.description: The keycloak user id of a user.

parameters.name: changemakerId
parameters.description: The id of a changemaker.

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: The permission to be deleted.
